con:part.con:content: {"openapi":"3.0.0","info":{"version":"1.2.0","title":"Payees API","description":"API generated by SwaggerHub Explore"},"paths":{"/payee/{payeeId}":{"get":{"summary":"Find payee by ID","description":"Ability to return details of specific payees using ID's","parameters":[{"name":"payeeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Payee"}}}},"404":{"description":"ID not found"}}},"post":{"summary":"Find payee by ID","description":"Ability to return details of specific payees using ID's","parameters":[{"name":"payeeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Payee"}}}},"404":{"description":"ID not found"}}},"delete":{"summary":"Find payee by ID","description":"Ability to return details of specific payees using ID's","parameters":[{"name":"payeeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Payee"}}}},"404":{"description":"ID not found"}}}}},"servers":[{"description":"SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking","url":"https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/Adrians_Org/Payees_API/1.2.0"}],"components":{"schemas":{"Payee":{"type":"object","properties":{"firstName":{"type":"string"},"lastName":{"type":"string"},"accountName":{"type":"string","description":"name associated with bank account"},"iban":{"type":"string","description":"iban number associated with account"},"bankAccountCurrency":{"type":"string","description":"currency of account"},"bankName":{"type":"string","description":"name of bank"}}}}}}
